intro: When you spend a really long time~            creating something...
when you feel like you have poured~        your entire SOUL into it...
when you believe your art~     will be praised by everyone...
"Wanna become a big shot?~                    Ask me how!"
Gimme some @2PENCILS@, and my @4QUACKY VISION@ will take you to~                       the top!
But you only have ~@2                      one pencil@.%%
credits: Game author~^kr0tyara^~~Made for~^en.toonio.ru^~~Owner of Michael Grey (the kitty from Quacky Vision)~^MishamiEXE^~~Playtesters~^Ivan Lindgren^~^Evillina Lindgren^~^Kocherga^~^MishamiEXE^~^Qbnika^~^lbogachl^~~Developers of $1 Unistroke Recognizer~(re-distributed under the new BSD license)~^Jacob O. Wobbrock~Andrew D. Wilson~Yang Li^~~~~~~~~^Thanks for playing!^~  - kr0tyara, 2025

check: ~No one - ATK 1000 DEF -999.~Do we remember connected rainbows?

nothing: You ate... umm...~Did you even eat anything?~I feel sick.
sharpener_1: You sharpen the pencil.~Restored @47 health@!~The sharpener's googly eyes came off.
sharpener_2: You sharpen the pencil.~Restored @47 health@!~The sharpener is about to break.
sharpener_3: You sharpen the pencil.~Restored @47 health@!~@2The sharpener broke.@
sharpener_fail: You take out the sharpener, but...%~You realize that you have nothing left to sharpen.
rubber_band: You tie the rubber band around a pencil.~Next @45 turns@ you will be able to draw longer!
rubber_band_fail: You take out a rubber band.~You look at it with admiration.~You put it back in your pocket.
ghost_candy: Invincibility upon taking damage increases for next @43 turns@.
ghost_candy_1: You feel... Something. %It's like the candy went right through you.~
ghost_candy_2: You eat another piece of candy... %The same feeling. But this one has a slight blueberry aftertaste.~

disclaimer: By signing this contract, you confirm the transfer of your soul to PromoDuck, LLC. Yep, you got it right.
We'll take your soul. We'll digitize it and trap inside a yet another Undertale rip-off, and we won't share any profits with you.
Qua-ha-ha! You cannot decline this contract, because there is no other way to finish the game. Don't even try.
game_over: Come back when you're a little... m-m-m... richer.
One day even you will be able to afford something!~      Start with something small. A potato will do.
check: ~PromoDuck — owner of Quacky Vision.~Has a good taste in tree bark. VERY HANDSOME. *
check_2: ~PromoDuck — owner of Quacky Vision.~Tries too hard to imitate someone like Scrooge McDuck, but he's definitely not good at it... %Are ducks even supposed to have teeth?
check_geno: ~PromoDuck — %just a %loser.~A dreamer% that lost the meaning of his life.~@1Because of you.@
idle: ~PromoDuck cleans his feathers.%~You can clearly see the bald spot.
~PromoDuck is calculating his profits.%~Without a calculator.
~PromoDuck is picking his teeth.~Or rather, he's just gnawing on a toothpick...
idle2: ~PromoDuck is... praying???%%%~...or perhaps you just misheard it.
~Smells like wet chicken nuggets and sawdust.
~PromoDuck cancels all meetings.%~Even for the next year.
idle_signed: Your art is finally on Quacky Vision!~However, you don't have a pencil anymore...
idle_weakened: ~(If I were you, I would listen to him.)
idle_tutorial: ~(Redraw the spell according to the template without releasing the pencil to attack!)
weakened: I see, you're a master of your pencil and all that...
B-but I'm not your ^punching bag^, I'm a living creature.
J-just wait until the bid resets, promote your art for one pencil, and it all will resolve peacefully.
T-that's why you're here%, is it not?
weakened_alt: I see, you're a master of your pencil and all that...
B-but I'm not your ^punching bag^, I'm a living creature.
Quacky Vision is already free, so just promote your art and we'll go our separate ways peacefully.
T-that's why you're here%, is it not?
attack_finally: Just don't swing that thing THIS hard....
mockery1: #1Oh my god! What a terrifying attack! ^SPARE ME!!!^*
mockery3: Should tell you what to do?...
mockery4: Just DRAW the spell with your pencil!!
And don't let it go until you're done.
attack_scribble: Attacking with your doodles, I see?
attack_scribble_2_alt: #4As you can see, I'm a great artist and I will continue to delight you with my creativity!*
attack_popsicle_success: #DThe stick is the best part anyways!
shield_deal: ~You offer the pencil.~...PromoDuck looks out a little from behind his makeshift shield.
shield_deal_speech: S-sorry, I c-can't reset the bet on my own.
So you'll have to wait a little longer before it resets...
Your attacks, cough, have exhausted me a lot, so let's d-do this.
You @2will not attack me@, and I will n-not attack your p-pencil.
We'll just s-sit here in silence...
shield_deal_wait: Over time, PromoDuck calms down, even offers you a cup of tea.
And Quacky Vision is free now.
Did you HAVE to drive the poor guy half to his death?...
shield_deal_wait_speech: Would you look at the time...
I hope you'll leave me alone now...
shield_deal_alt: ~You offer the pencil.~...PromoDuck looks out a little from behind his makeshift shield.
shield_deal_alt_speech: Ahem!.. Would you look at the time...
Seems like no one else wants to make a bid.~You're in luck, kiddo!
All you have to do is to sign the contract.
shield_deal_alt2_speech: Sign the contract and I'll post your art to Quacky Vision.
deal_broke_2: Don't cry, kiddo. Uncle PromoDuck's got enough forms to give out for your entire life.
deal_broke_3: Don't even try, you're not going anywhere anyway.
deal_dunno_1: ...You don't know how to fill a form?
Just draw something inside the square by the "Yes" label.
A checkmark, a cross, a spiral, an icosododecahedron, it doesn't matter.
deal_dunno_2: #FI won't explain it all a second time.
deal_no_1: #FThen why are you hanging around here?? Wasting my precious time??!!
deal_signed_2: Pleasure doing business with ya!~As agreed, your toon is now on Quacky Vision.
deal_signed_2_alt: Pleasure doing business with ya!~As agreed, your toon is now on Quacky Vision.
#BThat's how business works, kid.~What else did you expect from such a low bid?
vandalism: Draw anything to speed up the bid reset!
vandalism_fail: ...nothing happened.~(Try to draw as much as possible without releasing the pencil!)
reset_1: Would you look at the time...
Seems like no one else wants to make a bid.~You're in luck, kiddo!
You can finally give me your pencil and leave me alone.
reset_3: #A^Do you realize how much of my time you wasted^?!
#FTime is money, kid.~Instead of fighting with you, I could make..........
Well, it doesn't matter. Sign the contract and get out!
reset_4: #E$Tee-hee! I'll bring a pencil and stick it in Uncle PromoDuck's face, and he won't do anything about it!!$
reset_6: #FAre you getting some kind of pleasure from my torment or what?
#FJust because I can't kick you out* doesn't mean I'm your personal jester.
#2$* Toony forbids me to turn away clients after that incident.$
story_3: #2$* The Quacky Vision does not provide any kind of protection against possible damage.$
story_4: #BAs long as this thing makes me money, I don't give a damn.
story_5: #1What is it? ^Reputational losses?^~You're going to tell the whole truth to ^your friends^???
story_6: I have a huge trump card up my non-existent sleeve.
I give people hope that thanks to Quacky Vision, at least someone will see their work.
story_7: And as long as they believe in it, they will bring me their Pencils.
story_8: Psst, how do you like my supervillain speech? I've been preparing it for a month!
I hope that when our club finally gathers to play "Sandboxes and Dragoons" again, they'll like it...
And, welp...~I'm running out of attack ideas...
#2$* The popsicle will be consumed by %me.$
geno_phone_2: (I guess I can't wait for him ^any longer...^)
bet_draw: ~Sign the contract to post your art on Quacky Vision for one pencil.
bet_dumb: Hey, you can't fill out the form three times already.
Toony told me that it was wrong...~But I have a secret form designed for %$dumb babies$.
bet_early_speech: #9ONE PENCIL????~DON'T MAKE ME LAUGH!!! I CAN ONLY NIBBLE IT NOW!!!
Well, you can WAIT until the @2bid resets@...
...but I STRONGLY doubt that your pencil will withstand my attacks!!!
bet_early_2: ~You still have one pencil and the Quacky Vision is still unavailable, but you don't give up.
bet_early_2_speech: Wait for the bid to reset, or go get me some more pencils!*
bet_early_3: ~Seems like you'll have to wait for the bid to reset and only then offer the pencil.
